books.title: harry potter
books.story: Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: blanche neige
books.story: 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs' is a 19th-century German fairy tale that is today known widely across the Western world.The fairy tale features such elements as the magic mirror, the poisoned apple, the glass coffin, and the characters of the Evil Queen and the seven Dwarfs.

books.title: alice
books.story: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (commonly Alice in Wonderland) is an 1865 English novel by Lewis Carroll. It details the story of a young girl named Alice who falls through a rabbit hole into a fantasy world of anthropomorphic creatures.

books.title: cendrillon
books.story: Cendrilla is a young woman living in forsaken circumstances that are suddenly changed to remarkable fortune, with her ascension to the throne via marriage.

books.title: luke cage
books.story: When a sabotaged experiment gives him super strength and unbreakable skin, Luke Cage becomes a fugitive attempting to rebuild his life in Harlem and must soon confront his past and fight a battle for the heart of his city.

books.title: Jessica Jones
books.story: essica Jones is a superpowered woman who had a brief superhero career until an incident in which the villainous Kilgrave caused her to kill someone. After that incident, she became a private investigator. When Kilgrave resurfaces, Jessica must rise up to stop him

books.title: Le seigneur des anneaux
books.story: The Lord of the Rings is the saga of a group of sometimes reluctant heroes who set forth to save their world from consummate evil
